title: GOgroove SonaVERSE BX Portable Stereo Speaker System w/ Rechargeable Battery & 3.5mm Aux Port - Works With Apple , Samsung , HTC , Sony and More Smartphones , Tablets , MP3 Players , Laptops & More Devices
description: GOgroove SonaVERSE BXSingular Design + Powerful SoundFeaturing a unique cube design with style accents & LEDs, this speaker is an attention-getter. Offering more than just looks, 2 large side-firing drivers are ideal for providing loud stereo sound. Its universal 3.5 mm port & cable allow you to play from almost any device: tablets, phones, MP3 players, laptops and more!Travel ReadyGoing somewhere? Take the SonaVERSE BX with you! Sporting a rechargeable Li-ion battery, enjoy 3-5 hours of continuous audio. Charge by almost any standard USB port with included cable. The compact size makes it easy to carry & store while on-the-go!Flash Memory PlaybackMedia ports also turn the BX into an MP3 player! Play music from USB flash drives or SD cards up to 16GB. The playback controls play, pause, and change your MP3 tracks.Tech SpecsSpeakers: 6W RMS-12W PeakInput: Standard 3.5mm plug (cable incl.)Flash Playback: Up to 16GB SD/SDHC mem. cards & USB flash drivesBattery: Li-ion 3.7v, 600mAhDimensions: 5 x 4.25 x 4 inWORKS WITH:SmartphonesSamsung Galaxy S4 , S IV Mini , Active , Zoom , S3 , S3 Mini , S2 , Note 2 , Note 3 / Apple iPhone 5S , 5C , 5 , 4S , 4 / Nokia Lumia 1020 , 925 , 928 , 920 , 820 , 625 , 521 , 520 / HTC One , Mini , First , 8XT , Droid DNA , 8X , EVO , Desire , One X+ , X , SV , S / LG G2 , Google Nexus 4 , Optimus G Pro , G , GJ , L3 / Motorola Moto X , Droid MAXX , Ultra , Mini , RAZR MAXX HD , M / BlackBerry Z10 , Q10 , Q5 / Sony Xperia Z , ZL , T , STabletsNew Google Nexus 7 FHD , 10 / Nook HD / Acer Iconia / Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7.0 , Note 8.0 , 10.1 / Microsoft Surface Pro , RT / Asus VivoTab RT , Smart , MeMO Pad FHD 10 , HD 7 , Transformer / Apple iPad 4 , iPad mini / Coby Kyros / Hisense Sero 7 Pro , LTMP3 PlayersiPod / Sandisk Sansa Clip+ , Fuze , Zip / Galaxy Media Player / WalkmanPlus Laptops, DVD Players & more!
